titleStmt.title: A new systeme of the Apocalypse, or, Plain and methodical illustrations of all the visions in the Revelation of St. Iohn written by a French minister in the year 1685. and finisht but two days before the dragoons plunderd him of all, except this treatise ; to which is added, this author's Defence of his illustrations, concerning the non-effusion of the vials, in answer to Mr. Jurieu ; faithfully Englished.
titleStmt.author: French minister.

notesStmt.note: "A defence of the illustrations upon the Apocalypse of St. Iohn" has special t.p. and separate paging.
Error in paging: p. 58-59 of 4th page count omitted in numbering only.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
